text:
『...Holding onto that day, climbing the stairs
Remembering her smile──』

Chiyuki-san...
This travel agency's commercial is really... nice...!

Mhmm, mhmm!
Amana also feels like going on a trip now...

The person to whom you give flowers...
I wonder what kind of person they are!
Hehe, since there were no instructions...

I imagined the protagonist I played as, the kind old
lady who took care of me in the past── maybe...?

Is that so...!
...Hehe, somehow, I feel like I understand!

The gas-lit, cobblestone streets, shops lined with colorful sweets...
Going to give a bouquet of memories to the beloved person...

It's like something out of a picture book, a wonderful atmosphere
If even a little of that was conveyed, I'd be happy...
